verses.verse: The word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came<WH1961> again to me saying,<WH559>

"Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> say<WH559> to the leader<WH5057> of Tyre,<WH6865> 'Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> "Because<WH3282> your heart<WH3820> is lifted<WH1361> up And you have said,<WH559> 'I am a god,<WH410> I sit<WH3427> in the seat<WH4186> of gods,<WH430> In the heart<WH3820> of the seas<WH3220> ';Yet you are a man<WH120> and not God,<WH410> Although you make<WH5414> your heart<WH3820> like the heart<WH3820> of God<WH430> –
Behold,<WH2009> you are wiser<WH2450> than<WH4480> Daniel;<WH1840> There is no<WH3605> <WH3808> secret<WH5640> that is a match<WH6004> for you.
"By your wisdom<WH2451> and understanding<WH8394> You have acquired<WH6213> riches<WH2428> for yourself, And have acquired<WH6213> gold<WH2091> and silver<WH3701> for your treasuries.<WH214>
"By your great<WH7230> wisdom,<WH2451> by your trade<WH7404> You have increased<WH7235> your riches,<WH2428> And your heart<WH3824> is lifted<WH1361> up because of your riches<WH2428> –
Therefore,<WH3651> thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> 'Because<WH3282> you have made<WH5414> your heart<WH3824> Like the heart<WH3820> of God,<WH430>

Therefore,<WH3651> behold,<WH2009> I will bring<WH935> strangers<WH2114> upon you, The most<WH6184> ruthless<WH6184> of the nations.<WH1471> And they will draw<WH9553> their swords<WH2719> Against<WH5921> the beauty<WH3308> of your wisdom<WH2451> And defile<WH2490> your splendor.<WH3314>
'They will bring<WH3381> you down<WH3381> to the pit,<WH7845> And you will die<WH4191> the death<WH4463> of those who are slain<WH2491> In the heart<WH3820> of the seas.<WH3220>

'Will you still<WH559> say,<WH559> "I am a god,<WH430>" In the presence<WH6440> of your slayer,<WH2026> Although you are a man<WH120> and not God,<WH410> In the hands<WH3027> of those who wound<WH9135> you?
'You will die<WH4191> the death<WH4194> of the uncircumcised<WH6189> By the hand<WH3027> of strangers,<WH2114> For I have spoken!<WH1696>' declares<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> God!<WH3068>"'"
Again the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came<WH1961> to me saying,<WH559>

"Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> take<WH5375> up a lamentation<WH7015> over<WH5921> the king<WH4428> of Tyre,<WH6865> and say<WH559> to him, 'Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> "You had the seal<WH2856> of perfection,<WH8508> Full<WH4392> of wisdom<WH2451> and perfect<WH3632> in beauty.<WH3308>

"You were in Eden,<WH5731> the garden<WH1588> of God;<WH430> Every<WH3605> precious<WH3368> stone<WH68> was your covering:<WH4540> The ruby,<WH124> the topaz,<WH6357> and the diamond;<WH3095> The beryl,<WH8658> the onyx,<WH7718> and the jasper;<WH3471> The lapis<WH5601> lazuli,<WH5601> the turquoise,<WH5306> and the emerald;<WH9064> And the gold,<WH2091> the workmanship<WH4399> of your settings<WH8596> and sockets,<WH5345> Was in you. On the day<WH3117> that you were created<WH1254> They were prepared.<WH3559>

"You were the anointed<WH4473> cherub<WH3742> who covers,<WH5526> And I placed<WH5414> you [there.] You were on the holy<WH6944> mountain<WH2022> of God;<WH430> You walked<WH1980> in the midst<WH8432> of the stones<WH68> of fire.<WH784>
"You were blameless<WH8549> in your ways<WH1870> From the day<WH3117> you were created,<WH1254> Until<WH5704> unrighteousness<WH9390> was found<WH4672> in you.

"By the abundance<WH7230> of your trade<WH7404> You were internally<WH8432> filled<WH4390> with violence,<WH2555> And you sinned;<WH2398> Therefore I have cast<WH2490> you as profane<WH2490> From the mountain<WH2022> of God.<WH430> And I have destroyed you, O covering<WH6> cherub,<WH5526> From the midst<WH3742> of the stones<WH8432> of fire.<WH68>

"Your heart<WH3820> was lifted<WH1361> up because of your beauty;<WH3308> You corrupted<WH7843> your wisdom<WH2451> by reason<WH5921> of your splendor.<WH3314> I cast<WH7993> you to the ground;<WH776> I put<WH5414> you before<WH6440> kings,<WH4428> That they may see<WH7200> you.

"By the multitude<WH7230> of your iniquities,<WH5771> In the unrighteousness<WH5766> of your trade,<WH7404> You profaned<WH2490> your sanctuaries.<WH4720> Therefore I have brought<WH3318> fire<WH784> from the midst<WH8432> of you; It has consumed<WH398> you, And I have turned<WH5414> you to ashes<WH665> on the earth<WH776> In the eyes<WH5869> of all<WH3605> who see<WH7200> you.
"All<WH3605> who know<WH3045> you among the peoples<WH5971> Are appalled<WH8074> at you; You have become<WH1961> terrified,<WH1091> And you will be no<WH369> more<WH369>.<WH5704> <WH5769>"' "
And the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came<WH1961> to me saying,<WH559>
"Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> set<WH7760> your face<WH6440> toward<WH413> Sidon,<WH6721> prophesy<WH5012> against<WH5921> her,

and say,<WH559> 'Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> "Behold,<WH2009> I am against<WH5921> you, O Sidon,<WH6721> And I shall be glorified<WH3513> in your midst.<WH8432> Then they will know<WH3045> that I am the Lord,<WH3068> when I execute<WH6213> judgments<WH8201> in her, And I shall manifest<WH6942> My holiness<WH6942> in her.

"For I shall send<WH7971> pestilence<WH1698> to her And blood<WH1818> to her streets,<WH2351> And the wounded<WH2491> will fall<WH5307> in her midst<WH8432> By the sword<WH2719> upon her on every<WH5439> side;<WH5439> Then they will know<WH3045> that I am the Lord.<WH3068>

"And there will be no<WH3808> more<WH5750> for the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> a prickling<WH3992> brier<WH5544> or a painful<WH3510> thorn<WH6975> from any<WH3605> round<WH5439> about<WH5439> them who scorned<WH9589> them; then they will know<WH3045> that I am the Lord<WH136> God.<WH3068>"

'Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> "When I gather<WH6908> the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> from the peoples<WH5971> among whom<WH834> they are scattered,<WH6327> and shall manifest<WH6942> My holiness<WH6942> in them in the sight<WH5869> of the nations,<WH1471> then they will live<WH3427> in their land<WH127> which<WH834> I gave<WH5414> to My servant<WH5650> Jacob.<WH3290>

"And they will live<WH3427> in it securely;<WH983> and they will build<WH1129> houses,<WH1004> plant<WH5193> vineyards,<WH3754> and live<WH3427> securely,<WH983> when I execute<WH6213> judgments<WH8201> upon all<WH3605> who scorn<WH9589> them round<WH5439> about<WH5439> them. Then they will know<WH3045> that I am the Lord<WH3068> their God.<WH430>"' "
